TextView.android:text: Start of Shift:
Set out all the stools and chairs at the tables and bars downstairs
Turn on all Tv's
Place carpet floor mats in front of doors, bathrooms and botton of stairs
Bring down bus tubs to server stations
Place trash cans at respective locations
During Shift (All shifts):
Take trash out when it gets full (either at server stations, outside the kitchen or the bottom of back stairs)
Take bus tubs up to the barback area once full (remember to take an empty one down with you)
Count Expo Tickets at the end of each ticket log shift
Make sure doors are being watched and no one enters through an exit-only door
Bus tables (we do not throw out any dish, only plastic disposable cups)
Spot sweep around tables
Happy Hour:
Take out all available full trash cans (only use the compactor)
Bus up available full bus tubs to the barback room
Sweep the floor
Wait for workers from the next shift to relieve you
Clock out
Bus Tubs (dishes and glassware) bussed upstairs to barbacks
All bus tubs are taken up at the end of close (i.e. no empty tubs are left out at server stations overnight)
All stools and chairs are stacked on top of tables (tables are NOT pushed to the side)
All upstairs Tv's are turned off
All downstairs Tv's are turned off
Pull new bar floor mats (place at the entryway to downstairs ice machines)
Pull patio bar fllor mats (place at the entryway to downstairs ice machines)
Pull old bar floor mats (place outside the patio doors)
Pull upstairs bar floor mats (place outside the entrance to upstairs bar)
Sweep and mop upstairs (if open that day)
Sweep and mop downstairs
Count expo tickets and log times on ticket log sheet (place stacked tickets on top of drawers, ONLY on sunday closes give ticket log to the managers and throw away the excess tickets)
Take out ALL TRASH and recycling to the compactor and recycling bins (NOT the dumpster at Stacks)
Take out big soggy (when the barbacks are ready)
Take out little nasty (the office trash cans) and big soggy (when thr barbacks are ready)
Clean and organize the expo room (every night)
Clean and organize harry potter closet (every night)
Pull trash cans from old bar (when the bartenders are ready)
Pull trash cans from new bar (when the bartenders are ready)
Pull trash cans from patio/dunn bar (when thr bartenders are ready)
Pull trash cans from upstairs bar (when the bartenders are ready)
Check with the closing manager for any additional tasks
